message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value that represents the amount of profit the entity retains after all expenses have been deducted from total revenue.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, the line item that represents this is "Net Profit". This value represents the entity's profit after accounting for all expenses including operating costs, interest, tax, depreciation, and amortization.

In the cash flow statement for 2024-02-01, the Net Profit is reported as -2035736.52.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '-2035736.52'}}
```
